mapper.select: select from evaluation ${page.condition} order by ${page.orderBy} limit #{page.start},#{page.pageSize}
SELECT b.* from ( SELECT evaluation_id from xnk_order where status = 1 and user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT} ) a LEFT JOIN evaluation b on a.evaluation_id = b.id

SELECT a.evaluation_id,a.user_id,a.nick_name as user_name,b.evaluation_img_url, b.title, b.introduction, b.evaluation_date, b.status, b.order_num, b.recomm_num, b.recomm_write_seq_num, b.hot_num, b.remark, b.create_date, b.modify_date from ( SELECT evaluation_id,user_id,nick_name from xnk_order where status = 1 ) a INNER JOIN ( SELECT * from evaluation where status = 1 and user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT} ) b on a.evaluation_id = b.id

SELECT count(id) from ( SELECT evaluation_id,user_id,nick_name from xnk_order where status = 1 ) a INNER JOIN ( SELECT * from evaluation where status = 1 and user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT} ) b on a.evaluation_id = b.id

SELECT a.evaluation_id,a.user_id,a.nick_name as user_name,b.evaluation_img_url, b.title, b.introduction, b.evaluation_date, b.status, b.order_num, b.recomm_num, b.recomm_write_seq_num, b.hot_num, b.remark, b.create_date, b.modify_date from ( SELECT evaluation_id,user_id,nick_name from xnk_order where status = 1 ) a INNER JOIN ( SELECT * from evaluation where status = 1 and user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT} ) b on a.evaluation_id = b.id ${page.condition} order by ${page.orderBy} limit #{page.start},#{page.pageSize}
SELECT a.* from evaluation a where EXISTS ( SELECT 1 from user_do b where b.type = 2 and b.status = 1 and b.evaluation_id = a. id and b.user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT} )
SELECT count(1) from evaluation a where EXISTS ( SELECT 1 from user_do b where b.type = 2 and b.status = 1 and b.evaluation_id = a. id and b.user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT} )

SELECT a.* from evaluation a where EXISTS ( SELECT 1 from user_do b where b.type = 2 and b.status = 1 and b.evaluation_id = a. id and b.user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT} ) ${page.condition} order by ${page.orderBy} limit #{page.start},#{page.pageSize}
